test_instructions.rust: Run `cargo test pqc_kat -- --nocapture` in node directory
test_instructions.typescript: Run `npm run test:kat` in SDK directory
test_instructions.browser: Run headless browser test in CI with WASM module

notes: Real test vectors must be generated using the actual pqcrypto-dilithium crate
To generate vectors: use the test_vector_generation example in pqc-crypto/examples/
Vectors should be cross-verified between Rust, TypeScript, and Browser contexts
CI must fail if any vector verification fails in any context
